... Um, everyone is here?
Let's start our special course, "Trait Inheritance".

"Trait Inheritance", namely, the skill of passing
the traits of ingredients onto items...

I know~
But this skill... depends on luck...

Yeah, but by using ingredients with "same traits",
you can determine the inherited traits to some extent.
Plus, you can enhance the traits, namely, level up the traits.

For instance, enhancing "DMG Up (D)" to
"DMG Up (D+)".

I see~
In this way, [px] will make a powerful alchemist, right â™ª

Nonsense! This is just an introductory course.
I will raise the bar later!

Sometimes, a trait could "be combined with the trait
of another ingredient and become a different trait".
"Physical ATK&DEF Boost" is a good example.

"Physical ATK&DEF Boost" is combined by
"Physical ATK Boost" and "Physical DEF Boost".

Remember, you can sometimes create new traits
by combining such specific traits during synthesis.

Oh~ I see... I didn't know that...
Alchemy is so profound...
In... In fact, I know that!

You're right.
Now we're one step closer to realizing our dream.

Fine fine. You don't have to save your face...
You just need to pay more attention.

Yeah. Items made with alchemy are different by "trait".
This is why alchemy is so much fun!

OK, that's all for today's class.
Make sure you'll review it after class.
